Set the permissions users have on this object

Set the permissions users have on this object

scripts_put_r_shares_users(id, user_ids, permission_level)

Arguments

id

integer required. ID of the resource to be shared
user_ids

array required. An array of one or more user IDs
permission_level

string required. Options are: "read", "write", or "manage"

Value

A list containing the following elements:

readers

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • users array,

  • groups array,

writers

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • users array,

  • groups array,

owners

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • users array,

  • groups array,

totalUserShares

integer, For owners, the number of total users shared. For writers and readers, the number of visible users shared.

totalGroupShares

integer, For owners, the number of total groups shared. For writers and readers, the number of visible groups shared.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
